thread.section_title: Bloomandwild Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bloomandwild | www.bloomandwild.com | 5 of 115
thread.title: Patti Rasburn

author: Patti Rasburn
title: Patti Rasburn
text: So easy to order, so prompt with delivery, and so much more than I expected. When you want to cheer some up you don't want them to receive what looks like an easy option gesture, you want them to know you cared enough, but so many times we get more hype and less product. Not with Bloomandwild. My injured friend returned from hospital to a wonderful display of scented flowers which showed her how much we thought of her. It's worth more than words.
